name: Learn About The Force, Luke
Lore: 'Luke relied on Obi-Wan''s knowledge and advice to learn the ways of the Force. Obi-Wan continued to counsel Luke long after the old Jedi''s apparent ''death.''',
Text: 'Deploy on table. Your non-[Jabba''s Palace] Interrupts with ''alone'' in game text are Used Interrupts, but if played during battle you draw no more than two battle destiny. Wherever you have a card with ''skill'' in its game text, your Force drains and battle destiny draws are +1. (Immune to Alter.)',
